nsbe: The mission of the National Society of Black Engineers is "to increase the number of culturally responsible Black Engineers who excel academically, succeed professionally and positively impact the community." To learn more about the National Society of Black Engineers at UCR, please visit our website at nsbe.engr.ucr.edu
swe: SWE at UCR is a professional engineering organization specializing in professional and academic development, increasing the female presence in BCOE, and outreach opportunities by encouraging young students to pursue STEM fields. We also frequently collaborate with other engineering organizations to help expand students' professional networks. Three of our larger annual events are Bourns Science and Engineering Day, Evening With Industry, and Research Networking Night.
